name: Backstage
description: An adolescent groupie zeroes in on her Blondie-like idol after the singer chances to cross her orbit on a publicity tour. Gradually their lives intertwine as, with near-operatic intensity, the film delves into the emotional dependence that grows between them.

review.author: grantss
review.heading: Style over substance
review.reviewBody: Had potential but falls back on the old French staple of style over substance. Some suspense but drifts and feels contrived.\n\nPerformance-wise, Isild Le Besco is irritating but Emmanuelle Seigner provides the suitable gravitas and hedonistic randomness as the pop star.

keywords: brief female full frontal nudity,female frontal nudity,female rear nudity,girl on top,17 year old girl
